name: Living is a problem because everything dies
name_original: Living is a problem because everything dies
description:
Hi and thank you for checking out my Game. This is my first ever game jam. 

The aim of the game is to get to the highest floor you can. Each level is randomly generated and a yellow portal is placed on the level, This will take you to the next floor.

Each floor you move up the enemies get harder, they receive more HP and deal more damage.

There is a small chance you will be ported to a shop so you can spend your hard earned coins on upgrades, Plus there are treasure chests scattered around the maps that are guaranteed to have an upgrade in them.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left mouse click - Melee attack

Right mouse click - Ranged attack

Q - Potion

I'm really pleased with what i managed to accomplish in 48 hours and i'm surprised at how much I know about game development.

There are a few things more I would have liked to add if i had more time, Like more enemy variants and bosses, Plus more areas to go to and explore.

Thank you for trying out my game and any feedback is much appreciated.
